from lcvista.permissions.models import (
    REACT_PERMISSIONS,
)


def add_permission_roles(apps, schema_editor):
    PermissionGroup = apps.get_model('permissions', 'PermissionGroup')
    AuthGroup = apps.get_model('auth', 'Group')
    Permission = apps.get_model('auth', 'Permission')
    RobotMonkeyButler = apps.get_model('robotmonkeybutlers', 'RobotMonkeyButler')
    ContentType = apps.get_model('contenttypes', 'ContentType')
    # 1. Add permissions
    #  A. Endpont permissions:
    content_type = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(RobotMonkeyButler)
    #   - add
    robotmonkeybutler_add_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='add_robotmonkeybutler', content_type=content_type
    )
    #   - change
    robotmonkeybutler_change_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='change_robotmonkeybutler', content_type=content_type
    )
    #   - delete
    robotmonkeybutler_delete_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='delete_robotmonkeybutler', content_type=content_type
    )

    # #  B. Add 'type' permission if needed
    # robotmonkeybutler_some_type_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
    #     codename='robotmonkeybutler_some_type', content_type=content_type
    # )

    # """  If there were a second type it would go here.  We are not implementing a second "type"
    # in the migration, but this is here for example: """
    # robotmonkeybutler_other_type_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
    #     codename='robotmonkeybutler_other_type_permission', content_type=content_type
    # )

    #  C. Add React permission
    ct, created = ContentType.objects.get_or_create(model='', app_label='react')
    robot_monkey_butlers_react_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='robot_monkey_butlers', name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['robot_monkey_butlers'], content_type=ct
    )

    # 2. Add / Update Auth Groups / Permission Groups
    #  A. Admin Group
    admin_group = AuthGroup.objects.get(
        name='Default Administrator',
    )
    admin_group.permissions.add(
        # endpoint permissions
        robotmonkeybutler_change_permission,
        robotmonkeybutler_add_permission,
        robotmonkeybutler_delete_permission,

        # # type permission
        # robotmonkeybutler_some_type_permission,

        # react navigation permission
        robot_monkey_butlers_react_permission,
    )

    #  NOTE:  We do not need to create the PermissionGroup for the Default Admin as it already
    #  exists.  All we have to do is add the permissions to the AuthGroup as shown above

    #  B. 'Type' group  (if applicable)
    #  NOTE: Since we do not have the concept of 'type' with this, then we just
    #  add a base role here
    robotmonkeybutler_manage, created = AuthGroup.objects.get_or_create(
        name='Robot Monkey Butlers',
    )
    robotmonkeybutler_manage.permissions.set([
        # endpoint permissions
        robotmonkeybutler_change_permission,
        robotmonkeybutler_add_permission,
        robotmonkeybutler_delete_permission,

        #  type permission
        # robotmonkeybutler_some_type_permission,

        # react navigation permission
        robot_monkey_butlers_react_permission,
    ])

    #  After creating the new AuthGroup and adding the permissions above, we also need to
    #  create a PermissionGroup which is basically just a wrapper around the AuthGroup which
    #  contains a description
    PermissionGroup.objects.get_or_create(
        description='Manage Robot Monkey Butlers',
        group=robotmonkeybutler_manage,
    )

    #   C. 'Manager' group -- If we were adding both Users and Program type
    # permissions, then we would also add a 'manager' group as follows.  Since
    # we are only implementing one type in this migration, we will save the 'manager'
    # group for a future migration

    # bulk_upload_manager = AuthGroup.objects.create(
    #     name='Bulk Uploads Manager',
    # )
    # reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage.permissions.set([
    #     #endpoint permissions
    #     robotmonkeybutler_change_permission,
    #     robotmonkeybutler_add_permission,
    #     robotmonkeybutler_delete_permission,

    #     #ALL bulk upload type permission
    #     robotmonkeybutler_users_type_permission,
    #     robotmonkeybutler_programs_type_permission, #  *** Contains both 'type's

    #     #react navigation permission
    #     robot_monkey_butlers_credit_permission,
    # ])

    # PermissionGroup.objects.create(
    # description='Bulk Uploads Manager',
    # group=robotmonkeybutler_manage,
    # )


def teardown_permission_roles(apps, schema_editor):
    PermissionGroup = apps.get_model('permissions', 'PermissionGroup')
    AuthGroup = apps.get_model('auth', 'Group')
    Permission = apps.get_model('auth', 'Permission')
    RobotMonkeyButler = apps.get_model('robotmonkeybutlers', 'RobotMonkeyButler')
    ContentType = apps.get_model('contenttypes', 'ContentType')

    ct, created = ContentType.objects.get_or_create(model='', app_label='react')

    robotmonkeybutler_manage = AuthGroup.objects.get(
        name='Robot Monkey Butlers',
    )

    Permission.objects.filter(
        codename='robot_monkey_butlers', name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['robot_monkey_butlers'], content_type=ct
    ).delete()

    content_type = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(RobotMonkeyButler)
    Permission.objects.filter(
        codename__in=[
            'add_robotmonkeybutler',
            'change_robotmonkeybutler',
            'delete_robotmonkeybutler'
        ], content_type=content_type
    ).delete()

    PermissionGroup.objects.filter(
        group=robotmonkeybutler_manage,
    ).delete()
    robotmonkeybutler_manage.delete()


class Migration(migrations.Migration):

from lcvista.permissions.models import (
    REACT_PERMISSIONS,
)
from lcvista.reports.reports.robot_monkey_butler import RobotMonkeyButlerReport


def add_permission_roles(apps, schema_editor):
    PermissionGroup = apps.get_model('permissions', 'PermissionGroup')
    AuthGroup = apps.get_model('auth', 'Group')
    Permission = apps.get_model('auth', 'Permission')
    ContentType = apps.get_model('contenttypes', 'ContentType')
    ReportConfiguration = apps.get_model('reports', 'ReportConfiguration')
    ScheduledReport = apps.get_model('scheduledreports', 'ScheduledReport')
    content_type = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(ScheduledReport)
    scheduledreport_add_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='add_scheduledreport', content_type=content_type
    )
    scheduledreport_change_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='change_scheduledreport', content_type=content_type
    )
    scheduledreport_delete_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='delete_scheduledreport', content_type=content_type
    )
    content_type = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(ReportConfiguration)
    reportconfiguration_add_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='add_reportconfiguration', content_type=content_type
    )
    reportconfiguration_change_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='change_reportconfiguration', content_type=content_type
    )
    reportconfiguration_delete_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='delete_reportconfiguration', content_type=content_type
    )
    reportconfiguration_type_read_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename=RobotMonkeyButlerReport.slug + '_type_read_permission', content_type=content_type
    )
    reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename=RobotMonkeyButlerReport.slug + '_type_read_write_permission', content_type=content_type
    )
    # """  If there were a second type it would go here.  We are not implementing a second "type"
    # in the migration, but this is here for example: """
    # robotmonkeybutler_other_type_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
    #     codename='robotmonkeybutler_other_type_permission', content_type=content_type
    # )

    ct, created = ContentType.objects.get_or_create(model='', app_label='react')
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='reports_robot_monkey_butler_read', name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['reports_robot_monkey_butler_read'], content_type=ct
    )

    ct, created = ContentType.objects.get_or_create(model='', app_label='react')
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write', name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write'], content_type=ct
    )

    admin_group = AuthGroup.objects.get(
        name='Default Administrator',
    )
    admin_group.permissions.add(
        # endpoint permissions
        reportconfiguration_type_read_permission,
        reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission,
        react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission,
        react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission,
    )

    react_reports_permission = Permission.objects.get(
        codename='reports', name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['reports'], content_type=ct
    )
    # READ, UPDATE, DELETE REPORTS
    reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage = AuthGroup.objects.create(
        name='Reports > Robot Monkey Butlers',
    )
    reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage.permissions.set([
        react_reports_permission,
        react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission,
        react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission,
        scheduledreport_add_permission,
        scheduledreport_change_permission,
        scheduledreport_delete_permission,
        reportconfiguration_add_permission,
        reportconfiguration_change_permission,
        reportconfiguration_delete_permission,
        reportconfiguration_type_read_permission,
        reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission
    ])
    PermissionGroup.objects.create(
        description='Access to create, update, and delete robot monkey butler reports.',
        group=reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage
    )


def teardown_permission_roles(apps, schema_editor):
    AuthGroup = apps.get_model('auth', 'Group')
    Permission = apps.get_model('auth', 'Permission')
    ContentType = apps.get_model('contenttypes', 'ContentType')
    ReportConfiguration = apps.get_model('reports', 'ReportConfiguration')
    content_type = ContentType.objects.get_for_model(ReportConfiguration)
    reportconfiguration_type_read_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename=RobotMonkeyButlerReport.slug + '_type_read_permission', content_type=content_type
    )
    reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename=RobotMonkeyButlerReport.slug + '_type_read_write_permission', content_type=content_type
    )
    ct, created = ContentType.objects.get_or_create(model='', app_label='react')
    # GET FRONT END REACT PERMISSIONS
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='reports_robot_monkey_butler_read',
        name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['reports_robot_monkey_butler_read'],
        content_type=ct,
    )
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission, created = Permission.objects.get_or_create(
        codename='reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write',
        name=REACT_PERMISSIONS['reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write'],
        content_type=ct,
    )

    # REMOVE FROM DEFAULT ADMIN
    default_admin_auth_group = AuthGroup.objects.filter(
        name='Default Administrator',
    ).first()
    if default_admin_auth_group:
        default_admin_auth_group.permissions.remove(
            reportconfiguration_type_read_permission,
            reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission,
            react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission,
            react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission,
        )

    # REMOVE PERMISSIONS
    reportconfiguration_type_read_permission.delete()
    reportconfiguration_type_read_write_permission.delete()
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_permission.delete()
    react_reports_robot_monkey_butler_read_write_permission.delete()

    reports_robot_monkey_butler_read = AuthGroup.objects.filter(
        name='Reports > Robot Monkey Butlers > saved report',
    ).first()
    if reports_robot_monkey_butler_read:
        reports_robot_monkey_butler_read.delete()

    reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage = AuthGroup.objects.filter(
        name='Reports > Robot Monkey Butlers',
    ).first()
    if reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage:
        reports_robot_monkey_butler_manage.delete()


class Migration(migrations.Migration):
